Description: Painted limestone stela of Wepaii; Hieroglyphic text.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr David George Hogarth
Bibliographic references: Zitman 2010 / The necropolis of Assiut: a case study of local Egyptian funerary culture from the Old Kingdom to the end of the Middle Kingdom (I, 333-334; II 213)
Ryan 1988 / The Archaeological Excavations of David George Hogarth at Asyut, Egypt 1906/7
